extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE  A grade of C- in SOCY122/6.0

basic.description: This course focuses on contemporary sociological perspectives of culture. It includes a survey of various theoretical positions vis à vis culture and society such as the high and low culture distinction, the rise of mass culture; cultural hegemony; populism and social resistance. Canadian culture is the predominant object of analysis.
basic.subject: SOCY
basic.title: Cultural Studies
